name: QuikDeliver
description:
This game was created for the 2020 Secret Santa Game Jam. I didn't get to spend as much time as I had wanted to, but I was still able to roll out the basics and get it to a functional state.

You play as a delivery person on "ice". You must deliver one gift to each person in town, but as mentioned, on "ice". Beware, you are being timed as per company rules, you will be penalized for your slow delivery skills! (Not really, never had time for this)...

Left Mouse Click(Hold): Pickup

Left Mouse Release: Throw

WASD: Movement

Shift: Run

Start the game by running into the HQ door. Throw presents into peoples yards, but be careful, there was no error correction so if you try to give someone a second gift or you miss a yard, the gift will be stuck there and a new one will not spawn resulting you to Alt+F4. :)
